author: yogo
title: Strategy Framework - AIM
description: 提案的生态系统是巨大的，没有一种策略适合所有的人，特别是像Cardano这样不断发展的技术。

f6_assessments.q0: Having focused on dozens of proposals in this category, many of them would have benefited of such strategy framework and understanding what kind of projects have been funded so far. In fact, it almost feels like the Challenge is a bit ahead of its time and with this proposal AIM is trying to bridge the gap between dreams and reality. This would be hugely beneficial in many ways, beyond the mere Accelerator & Mentors focus. All future assesment, review and voting efforts would stand to benefit.
f6_assessments.q1:
For $10K the value addition is immense. The team is highly capable and will surely bring in the promised results. They have already proven themselves as active members of Project Catalyst.

With this scope and budget nothing more can be expected but as "Version 2" it would be nice if the team would include projects from outside Catalyst by utilizing existing websites like https://builtoncardano.com/ and https://www.cardanocube.io/ for instance.
f6_assessments.q2: KPIs, Deliverables, Roadmap and Milestones are easy to understand, trackable and measurable. Well done!

f6_assessments.q0:
The idea is really nice and needed. Being able to groupe proposals by its many different features would help to find the right accelerators and mentors much quicker, addressing the challenge. Moreover, it would allow for different strategy development and for more a consolidated portfolio view of Catalyst. I would go deeper in this latter (maybe in a later stage) and create an  dashboard that would allow for an integrated view on Cardano proposals pipeline with some indicators.

The proposal is also well written bringing the key elements that help to understand the problem and how it will be resolved here. My only concern is how the tool would really work.
would there be any integration with ideascale? how would the info be update as projects evolve or change?
having this tool working well and easy is essential for this project. It should be easily updated and not only as new funds are done but also as projects develop., are concluded and so on.


 Its also good to see there'll be strategy recomendation on each "category". I just wonder how this strategy would be validated by the community.

It's also nice to have the UN SDG mentionted here. I see this proposal with a high potential impact, being able to scale up to other purposes (as pipeline management) if implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q1:
Theres a multidisciplinary already committed team with capabilities that are key to this project. The infos are also easily verified by provided links.

The plan is solid and budget breakdown is fair. Imporant to note that it not a very high amount for the potential impact of it.
f6_assessments.q2:
Mileestones and final deliverables are clear and defined. Throughout them, its possibl to check if project was done successfully.
There's not a lot of metrics per se but they dont see much appliable here, as the deliverables should be enough.

As for risk management, its important to understand challenges on having the information correctly updated and having the suggested strategies approved.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal is in accordance with the challenge goal. Its impact lies in gathering information and analyzing different strategies for different projects/proposers/accelerators with the aim to simplify proposers' acceleration.
I agree that we still need proposals like this because with the constantly evolving community there are new areas that need to be documented and analyzed and therefore create an information basis for those who seek it. 

Rating given 5.
f6_assessments.q1:
Given the detailed plan, budget, and proposers' skill and experience, it is highly likely that it will be successfully implemented.

The team members are active Cardano community members.

The budget is appropriate.

The roadmap is provided in reasonable detail.

Rating given 5.
f6_assessments.q2:
I find the stated KPIs reasonable for auditing both of progress and the success of the proposal.

Auditing is improved also by the level of detail of the roadmap.

Rating given 5.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer has provided a fairly clear description of the issue however it is somewhat vague in the initial problem. Essentially the team behind the Strategy Framework - AIM are seeking to improve the outcomes and access to mentors for Catalyst funded projects through implementing a database form that filters projects funded by their type, size, region, experience level and so on. In terms of how this project relates to the challenge it is specifically targeting a potential missing link throughout Catalyst Funded projects and the wide network of professionals in the Cardano community already, in such a way that it would be quite a ueful tool. The team have previosuly built other well used tools for catalyst and are familiar enough with the challenges facing the community to be trusted to know this will have a global impact on Cardano users.
f6_assessments.q1:
The success of this project will like many aspects of any decentralised platform - depend on the users interfacing with the tool and adoption of this tool by Catalyst itself to ensure consistent use across projects. There is a simple form suggested to navigate this and perhaps with some early adoption of this form and process the overall project will see great success and the efficiency will benefit the community at large. 


The team are experienced and aligned with the project and have provided a clear timeframe and fair budget to develop this tool and begin working on the collection and analysis of the data collected. Adoption of this tech is the greatest risk involved so it's possibly good for the team to consider how they will negotiate that and how they can talk to that risk mitigation within the proposal, which has undoubtedly been discussed and considered.
f6_assessments.q2:
The project team have developed a clear roadmap of success that has targets of how many funded proposals they are hoping to review for recommendation into accelorator programs. The database will be implemented following this 12 week period of analysis with a target of ahieving up to 25 proposers in Catalyst in the year following. 


The team have noted they will report back to the commujnity at events such as Town Hall and Swarm. However like most ongoing service based opportunities to the community - this will need ongoing support to maintain a useful database so it's unclear if this investment will suffice.

f6_assessments.q0: * The proposal mentions a problem problem, aligning perfectly within the challenge which needs to be solved in any case but specifically to accelerate the acceleration process. The solution would help all Catalyst members and simplify the onboarding of new members and connect relevant people with funded projects in order to boost them.
f6_assessments.q1: The team show deep evidence of professional and social proof via linkedin profiles, short CVs, previous funded projects, in depth knowledge about Catalyst issues, other proposers and describe how the big picture may look like. The roadmap in weeks is comprehensive, clear and realistic. The funding is broken down into small, understandable packages. The proposer could have included potential challenges and risks to a positive execution.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal explains the problem with current issues, e.g. seedstars intro. The targeted solution is described in an easy to understand manner and part of a bigger picture, which is also outlined. The metrics define the success of the proposal in multiple steps.

solution: 研究、分析和评估催化剂的生态系统，制定定制的专用战略，准备实施
experience: 企业家、导师、CA、提案人、Cardano AIM、Cardano4Climate、Wada、Sustainable ADA的积极社区成员
